about_the_game:
Do you like Robo Revenge Squad and supporting indie devs like us? Do you get a warm, fuzzy feeling, when you help creators expand their work? Do you like cool stuff and aliens? Well then, this pack is just for you!

The Supporter Pack is filled with the most delicious, alien-themed goodies:

  • Unique alien skins for the Discoball, Boiler, Fridge, Washing Machine, Glue Gun, Tennisball Launcher and Drone. Scare your friends and your enemies!
  • Exclusive hideout skins for the Alien Laboratory, Death Ray Projector, Mini Submarine and Alien Alloy Floor.
  • A brand spanking new UFO rocket ship to take off in style
  • Unique Alien Drone balloon will make you the envy of every balloon party
  • A sincere thank you from all our robotic hearts at Rikodu

Important note: There's some fancy swag in this DLC, but the Supporter Pack is first and foremost about showing your love and support for Robo Revenge Squad and the developers. The swag is just a bonus.
detailed_description:
Do you like Robo Revenge Squad and supporting indie devs like us? Do you get a warm, fuzzy feeling, when you help creators expand their work? Do you like cool stuff and aliens? Well then, this pack is just for you!

The Supporter Pack is filled with the most delicious, alien-themed goodies:

  • Exclusive hideout skins for the Alien Laboratory, Death Ray Projector, Mini Submarine and Alien Alloy Floor.
  • A brand spanking new UFO rocket ship to take off in style

Important note: There's some fancy swag in this DLC, but the Supporter Pack is first and foremost about showing your love and support for Robo Revenge Squad and the developers. The swag is just a bonus.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560TI / AMD Radeon HD7850 (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon 7950 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

short_description: The Supporter Pack is packed with alien-themed cosmetic items. Scare your friends and show your support with 7 exclusive part skins, 5 hideout skins and an alien drone balloon.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Romanian*
*languages with full audio support
